amendment.description: Amendment prevents the Federal Reserve and the Treasury from implementing new regulations proposed by an international entity, whether coming from the Basel Commission or from the Financial Stability Board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in Part B of House Report 114-839 to prohibit the use of international standards not specifically provided in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) pursuant to the rule.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Davidson.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
